resources.string: Data provided by © 2014 The World Bank Group.

EduData is an application that provides information about education around the globe and allows you to compare different aspects of this topic by indicators or countries.

Developed by Group 2-I: Polly Apostolova, Maher Atashfaraz, Ahmed Elsayed, Diana Ghitun, Yannick Jeras, CheokHo Mai, and Dillan Patel.

A special thank you goes out to Ephi Fonts for providing us with the Helvetica Neue font and to lecho for making the hellocharts-android api freely available on GitHub. A all credit for the country flag icons goes to Icon Drawer at http://icondrawer.com/flag-icons.php.
